name: HYCU X DPaaS on Nutanix Storage
description:
HYCU-X transforms your Nutanix infrastructure into a Hyper-Converged, Scale-out Backup and Secondary Workload Platform. It does this by auto-deploying HYCU, the purpose-built, Data Protection service for Nutanix, and auto-configuring Nutanix Volumes and Files for Backup, Archive and long-term retention. As HYCU runs as a service on Nutanix, customers are also able to leverage their extra capacity and dedicated secondary storage for test and development purposes.
####pre-requisite:
* v5.1 or later of Nutanix AOS on Nutanix reference architectures with extra capacity or dedicated NX, HX, XC series or other certified platforms.
#### License:
* [45-day free trial](https://www.comtradesoftware.com/free-trial/)
#### Hardware Requirement:
* 4vCPU, 4GB RAM, 10GB root disk and 32GB vDisk.
#### Resources Installed:
* HYCU - 3.1.3
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Support Information:
* Email: support@hycu.com
* Phone: +1 (877) 447-5774
#### Accessibility:
* https://[IP_ADDRESS]:8443/
* SSH username/password [hycu]/[hycu/4u]
* UI username/password [admin]/[admin]
author: Nutanix
